mapper.select: SELECT bno, sv_type, group_origin, group_order, admin_type, nickname, title, description, create_time, heart, view_no, member_no from ( SELECT * from ( SELECT rownum r, bno, sv_type, group_origin, group_order, admin_type, nickname, title, description, create_time, heart, view_no, member_no FROM sv_board WHERE sv_type = 'question_member' ORDER BY bno ) WHERE r BETWEEN #{board_NowStartBno} AND #{board_NowEndBno} )
SELECT sv_bno_sequence.nextval AS bno FROM dual
SELECT * FROM sv_file WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY file_order
